about_the_game:
Rift Riff is a tower defense game with free roaming monsters, predefined tower locations, overpowered upgrades, and vibrant worlds.

Monsters attack in waves, either going straight for your basecamp or attempting to destroy every tower in proximity. You obtain juice (your build resource) during monster waves and have the ability to build towers both during and after waves.

Surviving the waves of monsters in every world unlocks more worlds and gives you prisms, a resource that unlocks more towers and tower upgrades.

So what's the deal with the rifts? Rifts in spacetime fling you from one atmospheric world to another. While you summon towers and extract energy from each world to create a rift to bring you home (hopefully, probably, maybe) its inhabitants aim to sabotage your escape.

Features

  • A bunch (?) of worlds with various (??) scenarios

  • Multiple (?!?) hours of gameplay

  • Many (?!???!) towers and monsters

  • Unlocks, upgrades, challenges; some sort of progression (?)

  • If it wasn't clear enough: we're still developing the game and therefore don't want to commit to any numbers just yet. We'll announce things as we go right here on Steam, so uhhh... wishlist and find out?!

Made by…

Rift Riff is being made by game designer Adriaan de Jongh (best known for the indie hit Hidden Folks), graphic designer Sim Kaart, programmer Franz LaZerte, enemy wave designer Professional Panda, and music composer and sound designer Matthijs Koster. Rift Riff is made using the open source game engine Godot.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux distribution released after 2016
  • Processor: x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, x86_64 CPU, ARMv7 or ARMv8 CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with full Vulkan 1.0 support
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux distribution released after 2020
  • Processor: x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, x86_64 CPU, ARMv7 or ARMv8 CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics with full Vulkan 1.2 support
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
